text: I still think this game is vastly underrated, even as a fan of the first game. I loved it, really. Kohei Tanaka's style shines here, it gives me vibes of his work on Paladin's Quest II, and it's funny to think he composed a pirate town theme like this one before eventually becoming the composer for One Piece.
author: SupraDarky

text: I always liked the second game more than the first.
